mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte de la partie françoise de St. Domingue = A map of the French part of St. Domingo / faite par Bellin Ingr. de la Marine et depuis augmentée par P.C. Varlé et autres ingrs. ; J.T. Scott sculp., Philada
Map of the French part of St. Domingo
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Varlé, P. C. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown pictorially; depths by soundings. [original]
Shows classified towns, parishes, and "Places burnt by the Negroes ...," etc. [original]
Shows the area at the time of the Haitian Revolution, before Toussaint L'Ouverture forced the Spanish to withdraw in July 1795. [original]
Plate number "48" printed in upper left corner. [original]
Appeared with plate number 48 in: Carey's general atlas ..., Philadelphia, Mathew Carey, 1811. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Defective at upper left corner, with loss of a small part of the title. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Haiti--Maps
Haiti--History--Revolution, 1791-1804--Maps
